title: Smash Bros. Rumor Updates - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.29.18
description:
Get 30% off your subscription at http://lootcrate.com/games with promo code: GAMES

Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock to build your portfolio at http://games.robinhood.com

Tim and Greg run through the latest Smash Bros. conspiracy theories, Red Dead Redemption 2 PC leaks, and the final PlayStation Classic lineup.

00:02:28 - Housekeeping
 EXTRA LIFE IS SATURDAY! Extra Life 2018 is November 3rd! We’ll be streaming games and shenanigans for 24 hours as we raise money for Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals! Join or donate now: kindafunny.com/extralife
The Roper Report   -
00:03:48 - Grinch Update from Tim
00:22:19 - Red Dead coming to PC, Vr? Gabe Gurwin at IGN
00:32:00 - PlayStation Classic Line-up Revealed
00:38:15 - Pokemon Go Teasing November Event, Steve Watts GameSpot
00:39:45 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:44:40 - Do you think major sites will ever separate video game reviews for the gameplay moment to moment, story, and the tech of worlds built? - Nightmist
00:48:15 - Greg recentely stating that he did not like Arthurs personality and tone of red dead 2 I was immediately thinking about the theme of the last of us 2 being hate. The previews have been dark, ellie is very angry and everything seems to be centered around taking revenge. So since Arthur did not click with you Greg do you think you will have trouble relating to an ever darker game, or does your connection to the first game make you not worry as much? - Austin Moore
00:50:22 - I was wondering if you think it'd be possible at some point for Kinda Funny to do a special one-off show with hosts from other outlets like Easy Allies, What's Good Games, IGN, Game Informer, Gamespot, GameXplain, etc. - Brandon
00:55:12 - After hearing you talk some more about the Kinda Funny Showcase on Podcast Beyond. Are you afraid of leaks? It’s so common within the industry, but maybe it’s easier with less people involved? - Patrik
00:56:15 - Squad Up: Jake(Congratulations) - Mike and Eve got married 10/20
00:57:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:
TUESDAY: Greg and Dornbush
WEDNESDAY: Tim and Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg and Jared
FRIDAY: Greg and Andrea

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

that appear to confirm or at least suggest a PC version is in the works the filenames para Munder score companion auto-connect IPPC and command is PC version parentheses void 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 6 6 8 1 2 see directly mentioned the PC and another mentions a feature available in Grand Theft Auto 5 on PC the files also include multiple mentions of the word oculis which could be hinting at some sort of virtual reality functionality Rockstar hasn't supported VR within its other mainline games although it created a stripped-back le noir for HTC vive so this has the potential to be even more surprising than a PC port it previously took Grand Theft Auto 5 well over a year to arrive on PC after initially only coming on on xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 if the companion apps files are referencing a port it may be that it will take less time for Red Dead Redemption to to make the switch thoughts I think it's inevitable that this game comes out on piece I'm not a person I think it isn't gonna be soon
